'''Cold Noodles with Mountain Delicacies''' is a [[Special Dish|special]] [[food]] item that the player has a chance to obtain by cooking [[Noodles with Mountain Delicacies]] with [[Chongyun]]. The [[recipe]] for Noodles with Mountain Delicacies is obtainable from [[Ms. Bai]] for 2,500 [[Mora]].

Cold Noodles with Mountain Delicacies restores '''80''' [[Stamina]] with a 300-second cooldown. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].
